alert.note: Alert for Marquette (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 19 at 10:38PM CDT until May 19 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN GREEN LAKE...NORTHERN COLUMBIA AND SOUTHERN MARQUETTE COUNTIES... At 1038 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Montello to 8 miles west of Portage, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Portage, Pardeeville, Montello, Packwaukee, Wyocena, Mecan, Endeavor, Kingston, Marquette, Dalton, Briggsville and Glen Oak. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
